title: A lot of issues with the Android Pixel 4 XL and posting text messages in online discussions.
content:
A lot of issues with the Android Pixel 4 XL and posting text messages in online discussions.

Most sites have a little text box to enter reply and often when I click on something to fix a word or add a word it jumps to the top of the page and you have to scroll all the way down every time you touch the box.

Also many times when I go to enter text it starts writing over the words or letters next to where I'm entering text like you toggled insert on a keyboard or something but this is on the phone.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
